rows.label: tlk41400011_04_msg0001
rows.name: You have the air of an owner about you.

rows.label: tlk41400011_04_msg0002
rows.name:
What do you think happens when you buy
every single product in a shop?

rows.label: tlk41400011_04_msg0003
rows.name:
The shopkeeper, thinking you must love their shop,
will urge you to become its owner.

rows.label: tlk41400011_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Becoming an owner requires a considerable
amount of money, but there should be
great benefits as well.
